ClientStep: Request for Mayor’s Clearance and submit requirements at the City Mayor’s Office
Pay the required fees at the Office of the City Treasurer Windows 8 9 and 10 by showing the Order of Payment
AgencyAction: Receive payment based on the Order of Payment
FeesToBePaid: Certification & Secretary’s Fee – PHP 50.00 and 2 pcs documentary stamp for PHP 30.00

ClientStep: Secure Official Receipt and the documentary stamps that will be issued upon payment
Proceed to the Mayor’s Office and present the Official Receipt (OR)

AgencyAction: File a copy of the Mayor’s Clearance with its requirements

ClientStep: Submit Biodata, latest grades and Certification at the City Mayor’s Office
Review and sign the Scholarship Contract
AgencyAction: Retrieve the Scholarship Contract and route for signing

ClientStep: Review and Sign the Scholarship Contract
Review and notarize the Scholarship Contract
Accept and acknowledge receipt of the Scholarship Contract
AgencyAction: File a copy of the Scholarship Contract along with the requirements
